title: ECD Connect Data Report
text:
A summary of ECD Connect’s reach. This includes the ECD Connect App (open-access), all ECD Connect Partner versions (white-label) and Grow Great’s CHW Connect.



4


partner organisations




1,912


unique user sign-ups




12,300


total number of children added across all platforms
